channel.title: High def Paladin [WIP]
channel.description:
Yes, 100% made by me. This is my paladin from Diablo II LoD, Modeling the Items. Then going to model the body for it.
[IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv23/uberxgod/highdefpic.jpg[/img]
*Update* Added parts of the body, And some other items. [IMG]http://i666.photobucket.com/albums/vv23/uberxgod/smiterhd.jpg[/img]

item.title: High def Paladin [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:6, topic:360849”][quote author=h1 sk1ller link=topic=457141.msg3345970#msg3345970 date=1284846287]
Lawl… Hight def XD only thing high def about it is the textures…
[/quote]
High definition games don’t necessarily use extremely high poly models. Most of the definition comes from the way the model is textured, as textures go into real detail. You are confusing High definition with High Poly.

About the model: It doesn’t have a human touch to it. he has no shoulders… The way you added the arms gives the illusion that the arms are only attached to the shoulder pads. You should completely reshape the model and go for a more human look to it because in my opinion, it doesn’t look very human to me as is. Not a bad early-on version though, just needs to be reshaped.[/quote]

I know, I was also about to state that he needs to find better textures aswell XD

Read full topic

item.title: High def Paladin [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

I like it but i think you should look at some anatomy on the male torso. If this person was a paladin he would be fit and muscular. With your model, his chest is flat and his whole torso lacks much shape.

everything else looks decent, nice job.

Read full topic

item.title: High def Paladin [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Same problem with all your other models. There is no shoulder. I would love for you to try and fix that. Because every single model you have done has that problem if it is character based

Read full topic

item.title: High def Paladin [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

h1 sk1ller:

Lawl… Hight def XD only thing high def about it is the textures…

High definition games don’t necessarily use extremely high poly models. Most of the definition comes from the way the model is textured, as textures go into real detail. You are confusing High definition with High Poly.

About the model: It doesn’t have a human touch to it. he has no shoulders… The way you added the arms gives the illusion that the arms are only attached to the shoulder pads. You should completely reshape the model and go for a more human look to it because in my opinion, it doesn’t look very human to me as is. Not a bad early-on version though, just needs to be reshaped.

Read full topic
